snippet: While he appeared a grandfatherly academic, Dr. Sidney Gilman advised a network of Wall Street traders through SAC Capital and eventually crossed the line into criminal behavior.
abstract: Colleagues say involvement of Dr Sidney Gilman, noted Alzheimer's researcher, in insider trading investigation of SAC Capital is story of corrupting influence of money; Gilman was drawn into high-rolling life of consultant to financiers about pharmaceuticals and eventually, by his own admission, crossed line into criminal behavior.

byline.original: By NATHANIEL POPPER and BILL VLASIC

lead_paragraph: While he appeared a grandfatherly academic, Dr. Sidney Gilman advised a network of Wall Street traders through SAC Capital and eventually crossed the line into criminal behavior.

headline.seo: Sidney Gilman’s Shift Led to Insider Trading Case
headline.main: Quiet Doctor, Lavish Insider: A Parallel Life
headline.print_headline: Quiet Doctor, Lavish Insider: A Parallel Life
